advancedCodeSplitting.title: Advanced Code Splitting
advancedCodeSplitting.description: Support for separating code into critical and non-critical parts, loading components on demand to improve performance.

fileBasedRouting.title: File-Based Routing
fileBasedRouting.description: Easy-to-organize and scalable routing structure, allowing route files to be encapsulated in directories.

bundlerCompatibility.title: Compatibility with Any Bundler
bundlerCompatibility.description: Keeps the splitting process simple and manual, making it compatible with any bundling tool.

typeSafety.title: Type Safety
typeSafety.description: Uses TypeScript to ensure type safety and avoid common errors at compile time.

extensibilityAndFlexibility.title: Extensibility and Flexibility
extensibilityAndFlexibility.description: Allows customization and extension of routing logic to meet specific needs of complex applications.
